name: Sunsama
headline: Daily planner for busy professionals
description:
Sunsama organizes your work one day at a time.

In the morning, plan your day. Pick out what you want to work on today by importing your tasks and meetings for the day from your various tools. Decide how much time you want to spend on each item to make sure you're setting realistic goals for yourself.

As the day goes on, stay focused. Concentrate on one task at a time. Keep track of how long you've been working, and when it's time to shift your attention to something else.

When you're done, shut down for the day. Reflect on what you were able to accomplish. End the day feeling satisfied with what you could do rather than consumed by what you couldn't.

Sunsama is built to improve your relationship with your work. Work should be an engine for fulfillment, not for stress and anxiety.

# The daily plannerfor busy professionals
## Sunsama organizes your work one day at a time. Every day should feel calm and focused.
# Make work-life balance a reality
## The digital daily planner that helps you feel calm and stay focused.

14-day free trial, no credit card required

Trusted by professionals who want to do their best work every day
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362b5ed238ff8192acdfef3_company-logo-yc.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362c31b678c78d5b603ec30_company-logo-loom.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362b5ed0946c439001880a7_company-logo-github.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362b5edf8d9e7b5942c4c78_company-logo-nyt.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362c31bda8579c1ca802a8a_company-logo-mit.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362c31bb81bd109977b1129_company-logo-zapier.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/6362b5edf8d9e7a2852c4c79_company-logo-asana.png)
![An image of the UI showing the guided planning feature of Sunsama](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16f32c4631091a2ff2_home-feature-guided-daily-planning-min.png)
## Guided daily planning
Be intentional about how you spend your time. [Plan your day](https://sunsama.com/</features/daily-planning-and-shutdown>) using a step-by-step routine.
![An image of the UI showing the guided planning feature of Sunsama](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16f32c4631091a2ff2_home-feature-guided-daily-planning-min.png)
## Unified daily view
Pull in tasks from Trello/Asana/etc.Emails from Gmail/Outlook.Meetings from your calendar.
![An image of the UI showing the guided planning feature of Sunsama](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16f32c4631091a2ff2_home-feature-guided-daily-planning-min.png)
## Realistic daily goals
Decide how long you want to work on each task. End your work day at a reasonable time.
![An image of the UI showing the guided planning feature of Sunsama](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16f32c4631091a2ff2_home-feature-guided-daily-planning-min.png)
## Timeboxing
Schedule your tasks to your calendar. Complete your plan for the day.
## Drag and drop tasks from your project and task tools
Browse your tasks in Asana, ClickUp, Github, Jira, Linear, Monday, Notion, Todoist, Trello within Sunsama and pull in the ones you want to work on today.
![A set of icons showing Sunsama's native inrtegrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8d6323c0cf61d88151e25_integration-icons-1.svg)
![An image of the UI importing tasks from other tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16ecfab1626240af72_home-integration-feature-import-tasks-min.png)
## Imported tasks stay in sync
Sunsama automatically updates your tasks in your other tools when you import them or check them off.
![A set of icons showing Sunsama's native inrtegrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8d6323c0cf61d88151e25_integration-icons-1.svg)
![An image of the UI syncing tasks imported from other tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa1699fad77d04a94264_home-integration-feature-sync-tasks-min.png)
## Set aside time for emails
Drag emails that require heads down work into your task list and set aside time to work on them.
![gmail and outlook icons](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8de276cfafa16dec8521b_integration%20icon%20-%2003.svg)
![An image of the UI converting emails into tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa16b8f16c17af67d38f_home-integration-feature-import-emails-min.png)
## Follow up on Slack and Teams messages
Turn Slack and Teams messages into tasks. Remember to follow-up without feeling like everything is urgent.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/664e279363bfbdf0c78300a3_Home-Integrations_Slack%20and%20Teams%20\(1\).png)
![An image of the UI converting Slack messages into tasks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa166bf9fb269aea8023_home-integration-feature-import-slack-min.png)
## Synced with your calendars
Integrate all your Google, Outlook, and iCloud calendars in one place. Sunsama bi-directionally syncs with all your calendars.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/66d23b759185eaeb048c0dad_calendar_integration%20icons.svg)
![An image of the UI syncing multiple calendars](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/632dfa154dfc98db7a58392d_home-integration-feature-sync-calendars-min.png)
## Designed for the way you work
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8ea85f9a283567edf71da_icon-01.svg)
### Dark Mode
Looks good no matter when you work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8ea854af443800f8113ac_icon-02.svg)
### Focus Mode
Hyperfocus on your most important task.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8ea857adb7f078aff6165_icon-03.svg)
### Auto-scheduling
Automate scheduling your tasks to your calendar.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8ea85d8eeed5fb4fa02c0_icon-04.svg)
### Weekly Review and Planning
Be intentional about your weekly goals and progress.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8ea859bd3c4a4f58b4e91_icon-05.svg)
### Keyboard shortcuts
Move faster and do everything with your keyboard.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62e8f0af35fea192b30cd723_icon-06.svg)
### Analytics
Understand how you spend your time at work.
![Sunsama Icon Mark logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d1ff8aa73d90740883d447/62ea2bd2ba10f513daf48194_Sunsama%20symbol.svg)

generated_description:
Sunsama is the digital assistant for busy professionals who want to take charge of their daily productivity. Envision it as your personal daily planner, designed to help you organize your work one day at a time. Located in the picturesque town of Kailua, Hawaii, and a proud member of Y Combinator's W19 batch, Sunsama is a small but mighty team of seven dedicated to transforming the way you manage your tasks and time.

### What Does Sunsama Do?

Every morning with Sunsama, you can kickstart your day by importing tasks and meetings from various tools—think Asana, Trello, Gmail, and more—into a unified daily view. This feature allows you to prioritize what to focus on and realistically allocate time for each item, so you’re not just busy, but effective.

As your day unfolds, Sunsama encourages a focused approach: one task at a time. It’s about maintaining concentration and tracking how long you’ve been working. When the day winds down, Sunsama helps you reflect—not with regret on what you didn’t do, but with satisfaction on what you accomplished. It’s a refreshing shift that aims to improve your relationship with work, fostering fulfillment over stress.

### Key Features

1. **Guided Daily Planning:** Sunsama provides a structured routine for planning your day, helping you be intentional with your time.
2. **Unified Daily View:** Streamlines tasks, emails, and meetings into one place for easy access.
3. **Realistic Daily Goals:** Set achievable objectives for your day and work-life balance.
4. **Timeboxing:** Schedule tasks within your calendar to stay organized and on track.
5. **Seamless Integrations:** Pull in tasks from popular tools and ensure everything stays in sync.
6. **Focus and Dark Modes:** Adapt the interface to your preferences while you work.

### Empirical Impact

Sunsama has garnered respect within the productivity sphere, with endorsements from notable figures like Paul Galatis, CEO of Names & Faces, and Geoff Ralston, President of Y Combinator, who highlight its significant impact on their daily efficiency. 

### Try Before You Buy

Whether you’re looking for a structured planning approach or a way to harmonize multiple tasks across different platforms, Sunsama offers a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. It's time to set realistic goals, stay focused, and walk out of your workday feeling accomplished.

If managing your busy professional life resonates with you, head over to [Sunsama's website](https://sunsama.com) and take the first step toward a more organized and fulfilling work routine.
